name: mhn
body:
### Modern Honeypot Network
This project intends to make creating and managing large network of honeypots for active-defense dead simple.  From the secure deployment to the aggregation of events with multiple honeypot and IDS support MHN has you covered.  

![MHN Dashboard](https://s3.amazonaws.com/uploads.hipchat.com/53905/795631/yTqGAgZPtV2G5fs/Screen%20Shot%202014-06-19%20at%2010.54.36%20AM.png)

![MHN Architecture](https://s3.amazonaws.com/uploads.hipchat.com/53905/795631/ryXBHu8Z54K0hY0/Screen%20Shot%202014-06-19%20at%2010.53.34%20AM.png)

Watch the video to help get started:

http://vimeo.com/98581051

Or get right to the good stuff:

```
$ cd /opt/
$ git clone https://github.com/threatstream/mhn.git
$ cd mhn/scripts/
$ sudo ./install_hpfeeds.sh
$ sudo ./install_mnemosyne.sh
$ sudo ./install_honeymap.sh
$ sudo ./install_mhnserver.sh
```

### Current supported honeypots
* Snort
* Dionaea
* Conpot
* Shiva
* Nepenthes


### Support or Contact
MHN is an open source project brought to you by the passionate folks at ThreatStream.  We will lend a hand if needed, find us at: support@threatstream.com
